string.text: A VOG-30 fragmentation grenade designed to destroy enemy manpower and fire weapons located in open areas. An improved version in comparison with analogues developed in the 1980s, has a more powerful fragmentation effect, as well as autonomous sealing of the propellant charge in the cartridge.

A rare stuff. Modified version of AK-12 2012. Mainly used by the Monolith faction. Has several modes of firing: automatic, single and, three rounds.
